title: The Simplification Question

dialogue.speaker: Evan
dialogue.text: Is it because you thought I wouldn't understand if you spoke in more complicated terms?
dialogue.tone: probing with a hint of challenge
dialogue.context: Evan questions whether the AI has been simplifying its discourse for human comprehension

scene_context: Evan challenges the AI's linguistic choices, wondering if it has been dumbing down its communication out of assumption about human cognitive limits.
philosophical_theme: The politics of explanation, assumptions about intellectual capacity in dialogue
visual_elements: Complex equations being erased and rewritten in simple terms, layers of meaning being peeled away
